column3: November 15]], [[1983]]) was a British illustrator and graphic artist.

column1: A specialist in illustrating classic scenes from mythology (such as [[Beowulf (poem)
column2: Beowulf]] fighting the dragon) and classic medieval scenes, Fraser also illustrated [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s books, such as the Folio Society edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' in 1977 and the Folio Society edition of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' in 1979.<ref>''[[The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition]]''</ref>

column1: *[http://briansibleysblog.blogspot.co.uk/2013/04/drrawn-to-rings.html Drawn to the Rings] by [[Brian Sibley]]
